original_title: Ex- IGP Pujith Jayasundara released in case filed over alleged assault of lift operator
original_body_lines: The Colombo Fort Magistrate’s Court today (03) ordered the release of former Inspector General of Police (IGP) Pujith Jayasundara from the case filed over the alleged assault of a lift operator at the Police Headquarters.
The former IGP was accused of assaulting a lift operator at the Police headquarters in 2017.
Former IGP Pujith Jayasundara was arrested by the Criminal Investigations Department (CID) over the incident.
